events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website, but it doesn't fit at all. I want to request a refund or exchange as soon as possible because the size chart was misleading.
The issue has been classified as a Refund request based on the customer message mentioning wanting a refund or exchange due to incorrect sizing.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request regarding the jacket purchase.
Hello! I'm Sarah from customer support. I’m here to help you with your refund or exchange request for the jacket you purchased.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been opened or worn, so we can proceed with your refund or exchange?
My order number is 987654321. The jacket is still in its original packaging and hasn't been worn. I just want to return it because the size is way too small.
Thank you for the details. We can initiate a full refund once you send the jacket back. I will email you a prepaid return label within the next hour.
That sounds great, thank you! I’ll wait for the return label and send the jacket back immediately to get my refund.
We have sent you the prepaid return label by email. Once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
We are following up to confirm if you have received the return label and if you have shipped the jacket back to us yet.
Yes, I received the label and shipped the jacket yesterday. Thank you for your quick support!
Your refund has been processed and the case is now closed. Please contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
